title: Debian packaging for 0.13
body:
I have pushed ff9ed132362e537b5a66e9a9a74afbcf3d7a9d0d which contains the refreshed and trimmed patch series for current master. The package builds fine and passes tests during build. Lintian says:

```
W: python3-datalad: embedded-javascript-library usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/resources/website/assets/js/jquery-2.2.4.js please use libjs-jquery
W: datalad: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry usr/share/man/man1/datalad-add-archive-content.1.gz
W: datalad: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry usr/share/man/man1/datalad-add-readme.1.gz
W: datalad: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry usr/share/man/man1/datalad-addurls.1.gz
W: datalad: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry ... use --no-tag-display-limit to see all (or pipe to a file/program)
W: datalad: manpage-has-errors-from-man usr/share/man/man1/datalad-aggregate-metadata.1.gz 35: warning: macro 'datalad.metadata.nativetype'' not defined (possibly missing space after 'da')
W: datalad: manpage-has-errors-from-man usr/share/man/man1/datalad-create-sibling-ria.1.gz 60: warning: macro 'ria+<protocol>://<storelocation>#~<aliasname>'.' not defined
W: datalad: manpage-has-errors-from-man usr/share/man/man1/datalad-export-archive-ora.1.gz 15: warning: macro 'hashdirlower'' not defined
W: datalad: manpage-has-errors-from-man ... use --no-tag-display-limit to see all (or pipe to a file/program)
N: 4 tags overridden (1 error, 3 warnings)
```
